com.gensym.util
Interface VariableValueListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventMulticaster
public interface VariableValueListener
extends EventListener

A listener interface for Variables or Parameters. This interface is required to receive events regarding the value of a variable or a parameter. An ItemListener will not receive such events.

NOTE: this interface will work for both Variables and Parameters.

See Also:
VariableOrParameter, Variable, Parameter

Method Summary
 void receivedInitialValue(VariableValueEvent event)
          Called during addVariableValueListener to notify the listener of the variable or parameter's value at the time the subscription was started.
 void valueChanged(VariableValueEvent event)
          Called whenever the value of the variable or parameter changes in G2.
 

Method Detail

valueChanged

public void valueChanged(VariableValueEvent event)
Called whenever the value of the variable or parameter changes in G2.

receivedInitialValue

public void receivedInitialValue(VariableValueEvent event)
Called during addVariableValueListener to notify the listener of the variable or parameter's value at the time the subscription was started. Note that the method name uses the singular, unlike the similar method in ItemListener.
